summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transaction details for a Deutsche Bank account from May 1, 2015, to May 31, 2015. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and fees associated with the account, highlighting significant transactions and the ending balance.

persons.name: Mande Kirby
persons.context: Mande Kirby is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: Arda Beskardes
persons.context: Arda Beskardes is mentioned in relation to a transaction where funds were transferred to their account.

connections.description: Mande Kirby transferred funds to Arda Beskardes' account, indicating a client-attorney relationship.

events.title: Funds Transfer to Attorney
events.description: A transfer of $5,000 was made to Arda Beskardes' account.

keyFacts: The document details account transactions for May 2015, including various debits and credits.
Mande Kirby is the account holder associated with the transactions.
A significant transaction of $5,000 was made to attorney Arda Beskardes.
The ending balance of the account as of May 31, 2015, was $181,840.54.
The document includes various fees and charges related to the account.
